GRATITUDE The quality of being thankful ; readiness to show appreciation for , and to return kindness .

[I]0-i would like to dedicate this book to the alphabet . For those twenty - six letters have changed [my]0-i life . Within those twenty - six letters , [I]0-i found [myself]0-i and live [my]0-i dream . Next time [you]239-you say the alphabet , remember its power . [I]0-i do every day .
